title: Microsoft Copilot Usage
description: Track the adoption of Copilot within your Microsoft 365 organization.

definition.title: Usage of Copilot in Any Application

definition.content: Percentage of Copilot enabled users which are interacting with Copilot within any application.
This dashboard provides an overview of Copilot usage among licensed users in your Microsoft 365 organization.
Copilot usage within eight applications is reported: Copilot Chat, Outlook, Word, Teams, OneNote, PowerPoint, Excel, and Loop.
_Application usage reports are time delayed by up to three days._

definition.title: Users Enabled/Active by Application and Current Usage

definition.content: If your organization allows display of user principal names in reports, then the following lists will be useful to determine which Copilot-licensed users within your organization are not taking advantage of their license. Otherwise, you will see anonymized names. See [the Microsoft documentation](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/troubleshoot/microsoft-365/miscellaneous/reports-show-anonymous-user-name) on how to manage this feature.

definition.title: Days Users are Inactive with Copilot Across All Applications
Most Days Inactive with Copilot Chat
